name: Gladiator Simulator ALPHA 1.0.0
description:
Gladiators, armed combatants who entertains the masses with feats of survival and strength.  Normally a fight to the death, but the one in charge determines who lives and who dies.

as the arena leader you're placed in the position to pit combatants against vicious beasts and monsters known only in myth. 

This sim has some fun Easter eggs so keep an eye out on how things interact. There's a lot of updates to come as well. It's currently in alpha and I'll have at least a good year before it's a realized and fleshed out game. Feel free to leave feedback or suggestions, I'd be happy to discuss mechanics and monsters!

First release! man it feels good to put this out there. So far there are three buttons, and a LOT of mechanics surrounding them. to note what they do, human button places humans, animal button places animals, & monster button places monsters.  But the way each type interacts is unique and can cause some fun fights.
